code:
%%{Infra_LoadBalancer},
  "gantt": {Infra_Cache},
  "themeCSS": ".taskText,.taskTextOutsideLeft,.taskTextOutsideRight,.sectionTitle,.titleText,.tick text{Infra_LoadBalancer} .taskText{Infra_Ingress} .taskTextOutsideRight{Infra_Worker} .taskTextOutsideLeft{Infra_Cache}"
}}%%
gantt
title HRM System Project Plan (Infra_Worker)
dateFormat  DD/MM/YYYY
axisFormat  %d/%m/%Y
excludes    weekends

section Week 1 - Initiation
Kickoff & scope alignment              :a1, 10/11/2025, 2d
Requirements + user stories            :a2, after a1, 3d
Project setup/build/run baseline       :a3, after a1, 3d
Acceptance criteria + test plan draft  :a4, after a2, 2d

section Week 2 - Architecture & Auth
Service/API contract finalization      :b1, 17/11/2025, 3d
Data model + validation rules          :b2, after b1, 2d
Auth + role-based access flow          :b3, after b1, 5d

section Week 3 - Employee Module
Employee CRUD (Infra_Cache)                 :c1, 24/11/2025, 4d
Employee UI (Infra_Worker)      :c2, after c1, 4d
Profile + family members               :c3, after c2, 2d

section Week 4 - Leave Module
Leave request workflow (Infra_LoadBalancer)      :d1, 01/12/2025, 3d
Leave approval workflow (Infra_LoadBalancer)           :d2, after d1, 3d
Leave history/balance + UI polish      :d3, after d2, 4d

section Week 5 - Payroll, Reports, Security
Payroll calculations + salary records  :e1, 08/12/2025, 4d
Reports generation/export              :e2, after e1, 3d
Security/audit logging hardening       :e3, after e1, 3d

section Week 6 - QA, UAT, Release
System/regression testing              :f1, 15/12/2025, 4d
Bug fix sprint                         :f2, after f1, 4d
UAT + sign-off                         :f3, after f2, 2d
Packaging + documentation + demo       :f4, after f3, 2d
